verses.verse: And when Abram <WH87> was <WH1961> ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and nine, <WH8672> the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to <WH413> Abram, <WH87> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, I <WH589> am the Almighty <WH7706> God; <WH410> walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> me, and be <WH1961> thou perfect. <WH8549>
And I will make <WH5414> my covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> me and thee, and will multiply <WH7235> thee exceedingly. <WH3966> <WH3966>
And Abram <WH87> fell <WH5307> on <WH5921> his face: <WH6440> and God <WH430> talked <WH1696> with <WH854> him, saying, <WH559>
As for me, <WH589> behold, <WH2009> my covenant <WH1285> is with <WH854> thee, and thou shalt be <WH1961> a father <WH1> of many <WH1995> nations. <WH1471>

Neither <WH3808> shall <WH853> thy name <WH8034> any more <WH5750> be called <WH7121> Abram, <WH87> but thy name <WH8034> shall be <WH1961> Abraham; <WH85> for <WH3588> a father <WH1> of many <WH1995> nations <WH1471> have I made <WH5414> thee.
And I will make thee exceeding <WH3966> <WH3966> fruitful, <WH6509> and I will make <WH5414> nations <WH1471> of thee, and kings <WH4428> shall come out <WH3318> of <WH4480> thee.

And I will establish <WH6965> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> me and thee and thy seed <WH2233> after <WH310> thee in their generations <WH1755> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285> to be <WH1961> a God <WH430> unto thee, and to thy seed <WH2233> after <WH310> thee.

And I will give <WH5414> unto thee, and to thy seed <WH2233> after <WH310> thee, <WH853> the land <WH776> wherein thou art a stranger, <WH4033> <WH853> all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> for an everlasting <WH5769> possession; <WH272> and I will be <WH1961> their God. <WH430>

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Abraham, <WH85> Thou <WH859> shalt keep <WH8104> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> therefore, thou, <WH859> and thy seed <WH2233> after <WH310> thee in their generations. <WH1755>

This <WH2063> is my covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> ye shall keep, <WH8104> between <WH996> me and you and thy seed <WH2233> after <WH310> thee; Every <WH3605> man child <WH2145> among you shall be circumcised. <WH4135>
And ye shall circumcise <WH4135> <WH853> the flesh <WH1320> of your foreskin; <WH6190> and it shall be <WH1961> a token <WH226> of the covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> me and you.

And he that is eight <WH8083> days <WH3117> old <WH1121> shall be circumcised <WH4135> among you, every <WH3605> man child <WH2145> in your generations, <WH1755> he that is born <WH3211> in the house, <WH1004> or bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> of any <WH4480> <WH3605> stranger, <WH1121> <WH5236> which <WH834> is not <WH3808> of thy seed. <WH4480> <WH2233>

He that is born <WH3211> in thy house, <WH1004> and he that is bought <WH4736> with thy money, <WH3701> must needs be circumcised: <WH4135> <WH4135> and my covenant <WH1285> shall be <WH1961> in your flesh <WH1320> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant. <WH1285>

And the uncircumcised <WH6189> man child <WH2145> whose <WH834> <WH853> flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190> is not <WH3808> circumcised, <WH4135> that <WH1931> soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people; <WH4480> <WH5971> he hath broken <WH6565> <WH853> my covenant. <WH1285>

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Abraham, <WH85> As for Sarai <WH8297> thy wife, <WH802> thou shalt not <WH3808> call <WH7121> <WH853> her name <WH8034> Sarai, <WH8297> but <WH3588> Sarah <WH8283> shall her name <WH8034> be.

And I will bless <WH1288> her, and give <WH5414> thee a son <WH1121> also <WH1571> of <WH4480> her: yea, I will bless <WH1288> her, and she shall be <WH1961> a mother of nations; <WH1471> kings <WH4428> of people <WH5971> shall be <WH1961> of <WH4480> her.

Then Abraham <WH85> fell <WH5307> upon <WH5921> his face, <WH6440> and laughed, <WH6711> and said <WH559> in his heart, <WH3820> Shall a child be born <WH3205> unto him that is a hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old? <WH1121> and shall Sarah, <WH8283> that is ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old, <WH1323> bear? <WH3205>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Sarah <WH8283> thy wife <WH802> shall bear <WH3205> thee a son <WH1121> indeed; <WH61> and thou shalt call <WH7121> <WH853> his name <WH8034> Isaac: <WH3327> and I will establish <WH6965> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> him for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285> and with his seed <WH2233> after <WH310> him.

And as for Ishmael, <WH3458> I have heard <WH8085> thee: Behold, <WH2009> I have blessed <WH1288> him, and will make him fruitful, <WH6509> <WH853> and will multiply <WH7235> him exceedingly; <WH3966> <WH3966> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> princes <WH5387> shall he beget, <WH3205> and I will make <WH5414> him a great <WH1419> nation. <WH1471>

But my covenant <WH1285> will I establish <WH6965> with <WH854> Isaac, <WH3327> which <WH834> Sarah <WH8283> shall bear <WH3205> unto thee at this <WH2088> set time <WH4150> in the next <WH312> year. <WH8141>
And he left off <WH3615> talking <WH1696> with <WH854> him, and God <WH430> went up <WH5927> from <WH4480> <WH5921> Abraham. <WH85>

And Abraham <WH85> took <WH3947> <WH853> Ishmael <WH3458> his son, <WH1121> and all <WH3605> that were born <WH3211> in his house, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> that were bought <WH4736> with his money, <WH3701> every <WH3605> male <WH2145> among the men <WH376> of Abraham's <WH85> house; <WH1004> and circumcised <WH4135> <WH853> the flesh <WH1320> of their foreskin <WH6190> in the selfsame <WH6106> <WH2088> day, <WH3117> as <WH834> God <WH430> had said <WH1696> unto <WH854> him.
And Abraham <WH85> was ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and nine, <WH8672> when he was circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin. <WH6190>
And Ishmael <WH3458> his son <WH1121> was thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> when he was circumcised <WH4135> <WH853> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin. <WH6190>
In the selfsame <WH6106> <WH2088> day <WH3117> was Abraham <WH85> circumcised, <WH4135> and Ishmael <WH3458> his son. <WH1121>

And all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of his house, <WH1004> born <WH3211> in the house, <WH1004> and bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> of <WH4480> <WH854> the stranger, <WH1121> <WH5236> were circumcised <WH4135> with <WH854> him.
